item.title: Need help specials only hit´s once!
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

lol 24 means that it takes 24% of the special attk so not making it hit more.

I mean with dclaws and dds i hit like 17-0 and with dclaws 30-0-0-0 i need so they other 0’s also hit (it always only gives ONE hit)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2009, 02:27:43 pm[/size][hr]I fixed it already…

item.title: Need help specials only hit´s once!
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“sjoukjeowns, post:1, topic:316027”]OK, i downloaded a source and the dds special only hit once!
Does anyone know why it only hit´s once?
Because of the dds my dclaws (i added) also only hit once because i copied the dds code a bit.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 0x426); getHit(95); usingSpecial = true; }

nothing wrong with it?
case is added in specials.java so plz help dunno what to do lol!

Ty, runb4udide[/quote]

change the 24.
